TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CLSID extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 充当 COM 类的全局唯一标识符 (GUID) 的包装。

span.span: Serves as a wrapper for a globally unique identifier (GUID) for a COM class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CLSID 结构将 COM 类标识符包装 (CLSID) 结构，该结构用作特定 COM 类的唯一标识符。The CLSID structure wraps the COM class identifier (CLSID) structure, which serves as a unique identifier for a specific COM class. CLSID 是类标识符的缩写，与 GUID 是全局唯一标识符的缩写相同。CLSID is an abbreviation for class identifier, in the same way that GUID is an abbreviation for globally unique identifier. 这两个缩写都指一个128位整数，该整数的统计可能性较低，因此可将其用作计算机和网络中的唯一标识符。Both abbreviations refer to a 128-bit integer with a low statistical likelihood of being duplicated so that it can be used as a unique identifier across computers and networks. 通常，此标识符表示为16个成员的字节数组或十六进制数字的特殊格式字符串 (其中字符 a-f 或-F 表示十进制数字 10-15) 。Typically, this identifier is represented either as a 16-member array of bytes or as a specially formatted string of hexadecimal digits (where the characters a-f, or A-F, represent the decimal numbers 10-15). 此字符串表示形式包含32个连续的十六进制数字，或由连字符分隔的8、4、4、4和12个十六进制数字组成的组。This string representation consists of either 32 contiguous hexadecimal digits or of groups of 8, 4, 4, 4, and 12 hexadecimal digits, separated by hyphens. 可选择性地将字符串表示形式括在括号或大括号中， ({}) 。The hyphenated string representation optionally can be enclosed in parentheses or braces ({}). 更多相关信息：For more information: - 有关唯一标识符及其格式，请参阅 。About unique identifiers and their format, see . - 通过 CLSID 结构和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC) 进行编程，请参阅 [MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。Programming with the CLSID structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
